sentences.en: A convex lens is used to concentrate rays of light.
A good tip is to buy the most expensive lens you can afford.
sentences.cn: 建议购买能负担得起的最贵的镜头。

sentences.en: A lens would magnify the picture so it would be like looking at a large TV screen.
sentences.cn: 透镜会把图片放大，就像在看巨大的电视屏幕一样。

sentences.en: A typical lens has a focal length ( f ) of 625 mm.
sentences.cn: 常见镜头的焦距 ( f ) 为625毫米.

sentences.en: By definition a cataract is an opacity in the lens.
sentences.cn: 白内障的定义就是晶状体混浊.

sentences.en: Click lens to f / 16 setting. Repeat entire process.
sentences.cn: 把镜头调到1/16, 整个程序再重复一遍.

sentences.en: He photographed this using a macro lens.
sentences.cn: 他用微距镜拍下了这个。

sentences.en: Level camera on tripod head. Set lens to f / 8.
sentences.cn: 把相机在架顶放平, 镜头调整到f/8.

sentences.en: Opacity of the eye lens can be induced by deficiency of certain vitamins.
sentences.cn: 眼球晶状体的混浊可由缺乏某些维生素造成。

sentences.en: Opacity of the lens is readily visible, especially in advanced cases.
sentences.cn: 晶状体的混浊易于识别, 特别是在晚期病例.

sentences.en: The autoexposure button is awkwardly placed under the lens release button.
sentences.cn: 自动曝光按钮安装在镜头脱卸按钮下面，十分不便。

sentences.en: The flexibility of the lens decreases with age.
sentences.cn: 眼球晶状体的柔韧性随着年龄增长而减退。

sentences.en: The lens of a camera forms images.
sentences.cn: 照相机的镜头使图像形成.

sentences.en: Why aren't all lenses supplied with a lens hood?
sentences.cn: 为什么不给所有的镜头都配上遮光罩呢？

sentences.en: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.cn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。

words.tran_cn: 透镜,晶状体,望远镜,放大镜

phrases.tran_cn: 非球面透镜，非球面镜头

trans.tran_cn: 透镜，镜头，眼睛中的水晶体，隐形眼镜，汽车的灯玻璃
trans.tran_en: the part of a camera through which the light travels before it reaches the film
